mapper.insert: insert into t_mall_attr ( attr_name, class_number_2, create_time ) values(#{attr_name},#{class_number_2},current_timestamp())

insert into t_mall_attr_value ( attr_value, attr_id, attr_value_name, create_time ) values
(#{attr.attr_value},#{attr_id},#{attr.attr_value_name},current_timestamp())
